game.name: Toucan Shooter
game.description:
This action-packed challenge is going to entertain you in a friendly environment for the long hours. Join Toucan Shooter and get ready to play the role of a pro hunter in your city! Today you have mistakenly entered a city that is full of cruel crows who are not only able to fly high in the sky, but they can also kill you. Your adeptness to shooting them with the help of a rifle will help get through all the hurdles in this brand new action game. 
In this one of the best 3D shooting games for boys, you will find out the pointed quantity of crows. Make sure to shoot them before they plan attacking you with the help of throwing bombs. You will also be given a chance to shoot and destroy bombs in the air. Track how many crows you have to kill in the present level by having a look at the top left corner of the screen in this shooting simulation game. The status of bullets will be shown on the left bottom of the screen. 
Play hard, and try to survive throughout the mission in this new unconventional survival shooter! You are on a secret toucan military unit so there is no chance to take your steps back. Be careful and try to stick to your quest until you complete your mission! Try to keep you away from the bomb since you will soon lose the game if it hits your regularly! Get the toucan meat to recover your health! Good luck to take as many precise shots as possible to complete all the levels!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Toucan Shooter at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!
